data.name: Marvel Heroes 2015 - Black Widow Hero Pack
data.detailed_description:
Natasha Romanoff was a young Soviet citizen when her government chose to train her in espionage. During her time in the infamous Red Room Academy, she became the master spy known as the Black Widow.

Items Included in this Pack:

  • Black Widow
  • 3 Costumes (Black Widow Avengers Movie, Black Widow Gray, Black Widow Original)
  • Black Widow Hero S.T.A.S.H. (extra Hero specific inventory, costumes will appear here)
data.about_the_game:
Natasha Romanoff was a young Soviet citizen when her government chose to train her in espionage. During her time in the infamous Red Room Academy, she became the master spy known as the Black Widow.

Items Included in this Pack:

  • Black Widow
  • 3 Costumes (Black Widow Avengers Movie, Black Widow Gray, Black Widow Original)
  • Black Widow Hero S.T.A.S.H. (extra Hero specific inventory, costumes will appear here)
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP 7 bit or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 DUO 2.1 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.1 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible ATI Radeon 3870 / NVIDIA 8800 GT / Intel HD 3000 Integrated Graphics with 512 MB VRAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete or Onboard GPU with 512MB VRAM (Nvidia 9600m GT, Intel HD 4000)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
